Texts.Eng:
Melee weapons behave a little differently in FrackinUniverse. The most important changes are listed in this codex.

^orange;Combos^reset;
---------------
Each strike of a combo, whether or not it hits a target, consumes 1% of your energy. This is to help reduce cheese-tactics that largely involve stun-locking enemies.

^orange;Shield Bash^reset;
---------------
Blocking with shields on enemies has a chance to Shield Bash. Certain gear can increase the Shield Bash chances.  

Shield Bash can damage foes, and send them reeling backwards. When Perfect Blocking, there is a 50% chance to Stun foes that are successfully bashed. When not perfect blocking, be wary: There is a chance -you- wil get stunned on a badly times block.

^orange;Dagger^reset;
---------------
+^green;25^reset;% Dodge Tech Efficiency
Combo Strikes increase Protection and Crit Chance with each strike.
^cyan;Dual-Wield (Melee):^reset; +^green;5^reset;% Movement Speed, +^green;10^reset;% Protection

^orange;Scythe^reset;
---------------
+^green;1^reset;% Crit Chance per Combo Strike
First Combo strike does +15% Crit Damage. Second hit does +25% Crit Damage.

^orange;Longsword^reset;
---------------
3rd Combo Strike does +15% Crit Damage
^cyan;Single Longsword:^reset; -^green;30^reset;% Combo Cooldown
^cyan;Longsword + Shield (Dual Wield):^reset; +^green;4^reset;% Shield Bash, +^green;1^reset; Shield Bash Push Distance, +^green;15^reset;% Healing Tech Efficiency, +^green;25^reset;% Defense Tech Efficiency
^cyan;Longsword + Any Weapon (Dual Wield):^reset; -^red;20^reset;% Protection, +^green;5^reset;% Movement Speed

^orange;Rapier^reset;
---------------
^cyan;Single Rapier:^reset; +^green;15^reset;% Crit Damage, +^green;35^reset;% Dodge and Dash Tech Efficiency
^cyan;Rapier + Dagger (Dual Wield):^reset; x^green;1.15^reset; Protection, +^green;15^reset;% Dodge and Dash Tech Efficiency

^orange;Shortspear^reset;
---------------
^cyan;Single Shortspear:^reset; +^green;30^reset;% Crit Damage 
^cyan;Shortspear + Shield:^reset; +^green;10%^reset; Shield Bash, +^green;2^reset; Shield Push Distance, x^green;1.2^reset; Shield Regen, +^green;50^reset;% Defense Tech Efficiency
^cyan;Shortspear + Shortspear (Dual Wield):^reset; x^red;0.8^reset; Protection, -^red;50^reset; Crit Chance

^orange;Mace^reset;
---------------
^cyan;Single Mace:^reset; +^green;2^reset;% Stun Chance
^cyan;Mace + Shield:^reset; +^green;3^reset;% Shield Bash, +^green;1^reset; Shield Push Distance, +^green;10^reset;% Protection
^cyan;Mace + Any Weapon (Dual Wield):^reset; -^red;15^reset;% Crit Chance, -^red;50^reset;% Stun Chance, +^green;5^reset;% Movement Speed

^orange;Katana^reset; 
---------------
Combo strikes increase Movement Speed by ^green;1 + (combo step / 10)^reset;% per strike
^cyan;Single Katana:^reset; +^green;15^reset;% Defense Tech Efficiency
^cyan;Katana + Heavy Melee (Dual Wield):^reset; -^red;20^reset;% Damage, -^red;10^reset;% Protection
^cyan;Katana + Light Melee (Dual Wield):^reset; x^green;1.15^reset;% Energy, x^green;1.2^reset;% Crit Damage, +^green;25^reset;% Dodge and Dash Tech Efficiency
